exec git init
exec git config user.email i@example.com
exec git config user.name someone
exec git checkout -b main

exec git commit -m 'initial commit' --allow-empty

exec git add file1
exec git stash save 'a stash entry'

exec git add file2
exec git stash save 'a stash entry'

exec git stash list
#stdout 'stash@\{0\}: On main: a stash entry\nstash@\{0\}: On main: a stash entry'
cmp stdout .stash

exec git status --porcelain --branch
stdout '## main'

gitstatus
stdout '&{Porcelain:{NumModified:0 NumConflicts:0 NumUntracked:0 NumStaged:0 IsDetached:false IsInitial:false LocalBranch:main RemoteBranch: AheadCount:0 BehindCount:0} NumStashed:2 HEAD:[a-f0-9]{7} State:Default IsClean:false}'
! stderr .

-- file1 --
super important file content

-- file2 --
super intersting file content

-- .stash --
stash@{0}: On main: a stash entry
stash@{1}: On main: a stash entry
-- .gitignore --
.*
